DOC.brief_summary: In study examine patient undergone unilateral ACL reconstruction surgery determine structural functional characteristic knee two ten year post reconstruction surgery , aspects original injury repair , patient characteristic risk factor osteoarthritis ACL reconstruction surgery .
DOC.brief_title: Multicenter Orthopaedic Outcomes Network ( MOON ) ACL Reconstruction ( ACLR ) : Onsite Follow-up
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study identify risk factor sign symptom osteoarthritis two ten year post ACL reconstruction information available time surgery ; include patient characteristic ( age , gender , body mass index ( BMI ) , activity level , clinical knee alignment ) , injury ( `` pop '' heard time injury , concurrent meniscus , articular cartilage , collateral ligament injury ) , treatment decision make initial surgery ( e.g . meniscus articular cartilage treatment . ) Primary outcome measure Western Ontario McMaster Universities Arthritis Index ( WOMAC ) pain stiffness subscales joint space width measure weight-bearing radiograph . Secondary outcome measure include knee relate quality life subscale Knee Injury Osteoarthritis Score ( KOOS ) Kellgren-Lawrence grade weight-bearing radiograph .
DOC.criteria: Had primary unilateral ACL reconstruction perform Dr. Kurt Spindler ( Vanderbilt University ) , Dr. Christopher Kaeding ( The Ohio State University ) , Dr. Rick Parker ( Cleveland Clinic ) , Dr. Jack Andrish ( Cleveland Clinic ) , Dr. Rick Wright ( Washington University St. Louis ) , Dr. Matthew Matava ( Washington University St. Louis ) 1245 year age time followup le 12 year great 45 year Contralateral ACL reconstruction Contralateral ACL deficiency Contralateral knee surgery nonactive unable participate health reason Revision ACL reconstruction
